p: The search for new therapeutic drugs requires conditions that simulate the environment found by the parasiteâ€“cell interaction, therefore, the assay against intracellular amastigote forms of tripanosomatids may represent ideal conditions, with macrophages playing an important role in the evaluation of drug-mediated toxicity [ 34]. Thus, it was evaluated whether A. rosaeodora essential oil and linalool could inhibit T. cruzi intracellular amastigote. However, the inhibitory effect was observed only when infected cells were treated with linalool although in high concentration, while A. rosaeodora essential oil presented activity at an even higher concentration.
